name: uuid-hash
author: Dan Lynch <pyramation@gmail.com>
description: Es6 class that generates RFC-compliant UUID v5.

scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc -p tsconfig.json; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; tsc -p tsconfig.json --declarationMap; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
